title: How many presidents have only served 4 years? - Quora

response.answer_text: I am listing those who lost reelection or chose mot to run again after one term, not those who were assassinated or impeached second term. Nor included is Lyndon Johnson, who was president for the remainder of Kennedy's term and then had a term for himself, but did not run for reelection. John Adams, John Quincy Adams, Martin Vam Buren, James K. Polk, Franklin Pierce, James Buchanan, Rutherford B. Hayes, Benjamin Harrison, William Howard Taft, Herbert Hoover, James E. Carter, and George H.W. Bush. Total: 12/44 (we are not including Trump as he is incumbent)
